title: Unchained alistar is not working
body: ive tried many times to get the unchained alistar skin but it is not working. please help.

replies.body:
The issue with the youtube subscribe button is a known issue and one that currently does not have a fix.
To receive the Unchained Alistar skin, simply submit a ticket to riot support and let them know that you wish to receive the skin. It should be added to your account a few minutes after that thanks to BlitzcrankBot.
You can submit a player support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
enjoy
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
This is indeed the correct solution!  Make sure to submit a ticket, and we should be able to help out!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=V6o2Zscy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-07T00:30:35.281+0000)
>
> This is indeed the correct solution!  Make sure to submit a ticket, and we should be able to help out!

What keywords do I have to use to trigger the bot?

When I got the skin on my smurf, an actual person had to do it because somehow the Blitzcrank Bot didn't pick it up.

hmm just try to describe it, like saying that you are having an issue receiving unchained alistar after subscribing to the youtube channel, actually mentioning the skin name itself.  

That SHOULD trigger the bot's keyword pickup since I remember keeping the message mildly short when I did it on my smurf ( when I did it on this account blitzcrankbot had not been implemented yet)
still good to hear that someone at customer support helped you out and hope you enjoy the free swag
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
